graph.layout.util

Class PositionAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • prefuse.activity.Activity
      • prefuse.action.Action
        • graph.layout.util.PositionAction

  • public class PositionAction
extends prefuse.action.Action
    Class needed to get the positions of graph elements after a prefuse's layout algorithm is performed. prefuse uses schedulers, so this class is supposed to be instantiated in order to be scheduled after the layout action
    Author:
    Renata
